GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: One Each of GSM Handset, Travel Charger, Battery Headphone, Protect Cover, Data Cable, User Manual & Warranty Card

Warranty.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the product is limited to manufacturing defects only
Warranty.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty does not cover any external damage caused to the product due to improper used. And no physical damage and water damage covered in warranty.
Warranty.Warranty Service Type: Off-site Warranty, Customer needs to take the mobile phone to nearby service center.
